Control Name: 7.2 Ensure that 'OS and Data' disks are encrypted with CMK
Control Statement: Ensure that OS disks (boot volumes) and data disks (non-boot volumes) are encrypted with CMK.

control_attributes.Control: 7.2 Ensure that 'OS and Data' disks are encrypted with CMK
control_attributes.description: Ensure that OS disks (boot volumes) and data disks (non-boot volumes) are encrypted with CMK.
